amendment.description: Making emergency appropriations to the Corps of Engineers for emergency assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1206 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1206 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S9219-9220; text: CR S9219) Making emergency appropriations to the Corps of Engineers for emergency assistance.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1206 proposed by Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1206 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
